name: 跨國企業經營策略
comment: 政經與區域發展領域。（大一、大二不可上修）
description:
根據本系之教育目標及發展特色，以培育跨領域能力之科學研究與應用人才為總體目標出發，本大學部課程主要訓練學生對跨國企業經營現況與策略有基本之認識、瞭解及其運用，使修讀學生除更熟悉全球化下跨國企業競爭優勢之基本知識及其運用外，亦可為未來進入職場作準備。因此，此課程主要從基礎知識出發，以企業策略角度面探討跨國企業經營概況。修讀學生不僅將可熟悉國際經貿關係及競爭策略之基本知識與分析外，更可進ㄧ步地從策略的角度研討並瞭解當前及重要之跨國經營等議題，及競爭分析之基本概念，並經由相關個案之探討，使修讀學員在個案分析的過程中，熟悉相關實務及基礎分析工具，培養基礎研究能力，除了藉此累積相關基本專業知識及培養分析及探索、應用能力外，並為未來進入職場，從事相關領域工作而作準備。因此本課程主要基本目標除了協助學生具備專業知識與專精能力外，並強調培養獨立思考能力、積極進取精神、主動負責態度、優秀團隊精神、國際宏觀視野與良好品德修養等重要性，以及對多元文化與人文素養之包容與尊重。透過課程設計與互動來達成此目標，並訓練學生成為受尊重又成功之專業人士。
This course is designed for undergraduate students to study theories and implementations of strategic management of multinational companies. To have a fundamental knowledge on the related theories and practices, students are expected to learn the basics, theories and practices of strategies, international business management, international environmental forces, the organizational environment, and how such knowledge and skills can be applied to the field of study for MNCs’ worldwide operations as well as to the preparations for future career. Hence, students will study not only the fundamental concepts and theories of strategies and international business management, but also the practical practices and issues through case studies and classroom discussions in order to equip students with fundamental and necessary skills and knowledge as well as the sense of responsibilities, teamwork and respect for multicultural differences. The ultimate objective of this course is to help students build up their professional knowledge on a solid ground, improve their probing capability for better intelligence quotients, and polish their interpersonal and communication skills with an emphasis on moral ethics for better emotional quotients in order to be a knowledgeable and respected professional in the field.

Week 1：Course Introduction, and Globalization

Week 2：National Differences in Political, Economic, and Legal Systems

Week 3：Differences in Culture

Week 4：Ethics, Corporate Social Responsibility, and Sustainability

Week 5：International Trade Theory, and Foreign Direct Investment

Week 6：Government Policy and International Trade

Week 7：Off

Week 8：Course Review

Week 9：Mid-Term Exam

Week 10：The Strategy of International Business

Week 11：Entry Strategy and Strategic Alliances, and Exporting, Importing, and Countertrade

Week 12：Corporate Visit/ Multimedia/ Discussions

Week 13：Global Production and Supply Chain Management

Week 14：Global Marketing and R&D
